name: T - Luna Nina
_source: speak;Luna; Did you just steal a wedding ring off a corpse?
speak;Luna; No, no, I definitely saw you take it!{w} You bent down and swiped it off a woman's hand!
speak;Nina; Hysteria makes people see lots of things that never happened.
speak;Luna; It{tgm}...{tgm} It does{tgm}...{tgm}?{w} But you're wearing the ring right now!
speak;Nina; I was wearing that earlier.
speak;Nina; Stop accusing me of things you can't prove.{w} Don't you have some demons to kill?
